nodes.text: The Elathan were a sentient species native to the Elatha system in the Stensen sector of the Outer Rim Territories. They had their first contact with the wider galaxy between the years 500–340 BBY, when they were visited by the Chu'unthor, a vast training ship operated by the Jedi Order. This first contact encounter garnered significant media attention across the galaxy.
The Elathan were created for the Power of the Jedi Sourcebook, a roleplaying game sourcebook published by Wizards of the Coast in 2002.
